DataElement.preferredName: Diarrhea Episode During Current Cycle Total Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the total number of diarrhea episodes during the current treatment cycle.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diarrhea During Current Therapy Cycle Total Episode
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Watery bowel movements._At some point in a given period of time._The name of the therapy that is currently being administered._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._A noteworthy happening that is distinctive in a series of related events.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A condition of frequent and watery bowel movements.

Property.preferredName: During Current Therapy Cycle Total Episode
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.:An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.:Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:A noteworthy happening that is distinctive in a series of related events.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.
An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.
Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
A noteworthy happening that is distinctive in a series of related events.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
